title: "Scroll" event and browser size in JavaScript
brief: When I was designing this personal website, I burst out lots of fancy ideas. One of them is the smart footer. The idea of the smart footer is really simple: when the page length is not long enough to fill the whole browser, the footer will show up; when the page length is more than the height of the browser, the footer will hide until scrolling to the bottom of the page.
